result.eng: I makes the page look a lot better if it is a little mode colourful than that.
result.ga: cuireann sé go mór le maise an leathanaigh má bhíonn sé beagáinín níos dathúla ná sin
result.orig: Cuireann sé go mór le maise an leathanaigh má bhíonn sé beagáinín níos dathúla ná sin
result.html: cuireann sé go mór le maise an leathanaigh má bhíonn sé beagáinín níos dathúla ná sinI makes the page look a lot better if it is a little mode colourful than that.

result.eng: Everything he did, he made it look elegant and neat.
result.ga: gach rud a rinne sé chuir sé maise agus slacht air
result.orig: Gach rud a rinne sé chuir sé maise agus slacht air
result.html: gach rud a rinne sé chuir sé maise agus slacht airEverything he did, he made it look elegant and neat.
result.ponchtml: gaċ rud a rinne sé ċuir sé maise agus slaċt airEverything he did, he made it look elegant and neat.

result.eng: He surprised her! That was nasty of him.
result.ga: tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi ba ghránna an mhaise dó é
result.orig: Tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi Ba ghránna an mhaise dó é
result.html: tháinig sé aniar aduaidh uirthi ba ghránna an mhaise dó éHe surprised her! That was nasty of him.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig sé aniar aduaiḋ uirṫi ba ġránna an ṁaise dó éHe surprised her! That was nasty of him.

result.eng: It's bad of people to expect praise.
result.ga: is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladh
result.orig: Is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladh
result.html: is olc an mhaise do dhaoine a bheith ag súil le moladhIt's bad of people to expect praise.
result.ponchtml: is olc an ṁaise do ḋaoine a ḃeiṫ ag súil le molaḋIt's bad of people to expect praise.

result.eng: I thought it was silly of us to argue.
result.ga: cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóint
result.orig: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóint
result.html: cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóintI thought it was silly of us to argue.
result.ponchtml: ċeap mé gur ẛeafóideaċ an ṁaise dúinn a ḃeiṫ ag argóintI thought it was silly of us to argue.

result.eng: It was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ga: ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.orig: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.html: ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibhIt was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ponchtml: ba ċloíte an ṁaise dom é gan coṁairle a ṫaḃairt daoiḃIt was bad of me not to give you advice.

result.eng: It was foolish of me to ask that question.
result.ga: b'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a chur
result.orig: B'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a chur
result.html: b'amaideach an mhaise domsa an cheist a churIt was foolish of me to ask that question.
result.ponchtml: b'amaideaċ an ṁaise domsa an ċeist a ċurIt was foolish of me to ask that question.

result.eng: It was bad of us not be grateful to him.
result.ga: ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch de
result.orig: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch de
result.html: ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch deIt was bad of us not be grateful to him.
result.ponchtml: ba dona an ṁaise dúinn gan a ḃeiṫ buíoċ deIt was bad of us not be grateful to him.

result.eng: For those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ga: ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.orig: Ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.html: ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaighFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁaiṫ an ṁaise don dream a d'éalaiġFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.

result.eng: If I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.
result.ga: más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duit
result.orig: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duit
